title: KripseAI
author: KripseAI
content: Cryptocurrency Makes Your Choice Kripse!Kripse AI is an interpretation and evaluation artificial intelligence program developed for cryptocurrency tokens in the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem.Try For FreeKripse AI scans the smart contract address transmitted as prompt on the Binance Smart Chain blockchain and evaluates it among similar projects with the same features, responding to the prompt request about its current status. During the interpretation and evaluation process, the token's smart contract deals with trade simulation, current holder status, website, wallet history of the token holder, and social media accounts.Kripse AI is an interpretation and evaluation artificial intelligence program developed for cryptocurrency tokens in the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem.Kripse AI scans the smart contract address transmitted as prompt on the Binance Smart Chain blockchain and evaluates it among similar projects with the same features, responding to the prompt request about its current status. During the interpretation and evaluation process, the token's smart contract deals with trade simulation, current holder status, website, wallet history of the token holder, and social media accounts.In summary; Kripse AI gives you an assessment of the current status of tokens.https://ai.kripse.comhttps://kripse.comhttps://docs.kripse.comhttps://t.me/kripseaihttps://twitter.com/kripseai
